Rules:
- The aim for the game is to move the the boxes to the goal (yellow circle tile). 
 - To do this you control the man in the direction you would like to go. 
 - You can only move one box at a time.

There are two game modes to choose from campaign or quick play:


Campaign - These are progressive pre built levels designed to be more challenging as you progress. At the end of each pack there is a boss level, this is where you play vs the AI. The first person to push all the boxes to the goals wins. 

Quick Play - Here you can jump straight into a randomly generated level by selecting your difficulty and mode. Solo is just a standard game by yourself, Challenge is where you play vs the AI. The first person to push all the boxes to the goals wins.
